keyword: how many calories are in a chocolate brownie
title: How Many Calories in a Chocolate Brownie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a chocolate brownie, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chocolate Brownie?
assumptions: Standard 50g piece from average recipe; includes butter, sugar, flour, cocoa, eggs; baked, no frosting or nuts.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, brand, size, and add-ins like nuts or icing. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical chocolate brownie has about 250 calories and 3g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a chocolate brownie?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard 50g piece.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a chocolate brownie?
faqs.a: Roughly 30g carbs, including 20g sugars and 1.5g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a chocolate brownie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 14g total fat, with 6g saturated per brownie.

faqs.q: How does brownie size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger brownies (e.g., 75g) can have 375+ kcal; smaller ones less.
Yes, low-fat or gluten-free versions can reduce calories by 20-50%.
